mapper.select:
SELECT /*[StoreDao.xml][selectList] 배송처관리 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , CLIENT_CD , STORE_CD , STORE_NM , BIZ_NO , BIZ_NM , CEO_NM , DELIVERY_NM , ZIP , ROAD_ADDR , JIBUN_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , LAT , LON , BIZ_TP , BIZ_KND , TEL_NO , FAX_NO , CONTACT_NM , CONTACT_TEL_NO , CONTACT_EMAIL , COUNTRY_CD , CITY_CD , DELIVERY_DC_CD , DELIVERY_DOMAIN_CD , ALLOC_PRIOORD_CD , CHANNEL_GBN_CD , DEAL_START_YMD , DEAL_END_YMD , DEAL_GBN_CD , USER_COL1 , USER_COL2 , USER_COL3 , USER_COL4 , USER_COL5 , REMARK , USE_YN , IN_DT , IN_USER_ID , UP_DT , UP_USER_ID FROM tb_ms_store WHERE 1=1
AND STORE_NM LIKE '%'#{codeCd}'%'
